channel.title: Monster Drops
channel.description:
ok so i just need to know where to make it so certain monsters cant or can drop certain items.
explain where to find it and ill figure rest out on my own thanks.

item.title: Monster Drops
item.dc:creator: @grimreaper61 grimreaper61
item.description:
@grimreaper61 wrote:

depending on what server you have, most have npcdrops.cfg. Open it up and you should see stuff like this//abyssal demon this is the format npcdrop = (mobid) (itemid) (ammount)(%) npcdrop = 1615 4151 1 1 npcdrop = 1615 1139 1 4 npcdrop = 1615 1291 1 10 npcdrop = 1615 1293 1 9 npcdrop = 1615 1295 1 8 npcdrop = 1615 1297 1 7 npcdrop = 1615 1299 1 6 npcdrop = 1615 1301 1 5 npcdrop = 1615 1303 1 5 npcdrop = 1615 1285 1 3 npcdrop = 1615 4587 1 3 npcdrop = 1615 1163 1 8 npcdrop = 1615 1079 1 5 npcdrop = 1615 2856 1 1 npcdrop = 1615 592 1 100

Read full topic
